data.Name: The Backseat Lovers
data.Bio: The Backseat Lovers is a young indie rock band from Heber City and Sandy, UT. Joshua Harmon: lead vocals and guitar Jonas Swanson: lead guitar and vocals KJ Ward: bass guitar Juice Welch: drummer and background vocals â€¨ The band started when Josh, having heard of local drummer Juice Welch, introduced himself and asked if he wanted to start a band. They immediately started working on arrangements for some of Josh's songs. Later Josh met Read more on Last.fm
